16384894Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const float PreMultiplyFactor = 1 / 255f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void SetPixeli(this WriteableBitmap bmp, int index, byte a, Color color)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     float ai = a * PreMultiplyFactor;Di2015NewLine     bmp.Pixels[index] = (a << 24) | ((byte)(color.R * ai) << 16) | ((byte)(color.G * ai) << 8) | (byte)(color.B * ai);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine
16384894Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Changes the color of every pixel in a WriteableBitmap with an alpha value > 0 to the desired color.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="wbmi"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="color"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static WriteableBitmap ColorChange(WriteableBitmap wbmi, System.Windows.Media.Color color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int pixel = 0; pixel < wbmi.Pixels.Length; pixel++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] colorArray = BitConverter.GetBytes(wbmi.Pixels[pixel]);Di2015NewLine            byte blue         = colorArray[0];Di2015NewLine            byte green        = colorArray[1];Di2015NewLine            byte red          = colorArray[2];Di2015NewLine            byte alpha        = colorArray[3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (alpha > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                wbmi.SetPixeli(pixel, alpha, color);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        wbmi.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine        return wbmi;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16388888Di2015UniqueSeparatorString[] lines = fileContents.Split({'\\n'}); // split the content into separate linesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool wasEmpty = false;Di2015NewLineforeach (String line in lines) {Di2015NewLine    line = line.Trim(); // remove leading/trailing whitespacesDi2015NewLine    if (line.Length == 0) { // line is emptyDi2015NewLine        if (wasEmpty) { // last line was empty, tooDi2015NewLine            // init a new datasetDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            wasEmpty = true;Di2015NewLine        continue; // skip to next entryDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    wasEmpty = false;Di2015NewLine    String content = line.split({':'}); // split the line into a key/value pairDi2015NewLine    if (content.Length != 2) // not exactly two entriesDi2015NewLine        continue; // skipDi2015NewLine    // content[0] now has the "key" (like "Lat/Long")Di2015NewLine    // content[1] now has the "value" (like "18.38891, -66.12175")Di2015NewLine    // both can be evaluated using regular expressionsDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16395528Di2015UniqueSeparator        string[] lines = System.IO.File.ReadAllLines("test.txt");Di2015NewLine        List<double> results = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var line in lines.Skip(4))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (line.StartsWith("<pre>"))Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            Regex numberReg = new Regex(@"\\d+(\\.\\d){0,1}");  //will find any number ending in ".X" - it's primitive, and won't work for something like 0.01, but no such data showed up in your exampleDi2015NewLine            var result = numberReg.Matches(line).Cast<Match>().FirstOrDefault();  //use only the first number from each line. You could use Cast<Match>().Skip(1).FirstOrDefault to get the second, and so on...Di2015NewLine            if (result != null)Di2015NewLine                results.Add(Convert.ToDouble(result.Value, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));  //Note the use of InvariantCulture, otherwise you may need to worry about , or . in your numbersDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

16396341Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Class1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Class1(Class2 class2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("implicit conversion from Class2 to Class1");Di2015NewLine        return new Class1();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Class2(Class1 class1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("implicit conversion from Class1 to Class2");Di2015NewLine        return new Class2();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Class2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T2 Convert<T1, T2>(T1 obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (T2)(dynamic)obj;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar class1 = new Class1();Di2015NewLinevar class2 = Convert<Class1, Class2>(class1);Di2015NewLine//outputs: implicit conversion from Class1 to Class2Di2015NewLine
16396341Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T2 Convert<T1, T2>(T1 obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var conversionOperator = typeof(T1).GetMethods(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine    .Where(m => m.Name == "op_Explicit" || m.Name == "op_Implicit")Di2015NewLine    .Where(m => m.ReturnType == typeof(T2))Di2015NewLine    .Where(m => m.GetParameters().Length == 1 && m.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType == typeof(T1))Di2015NewLine    .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (conversionOperator != null)Di2015NewLine        return (T2)conversionOperator.Invoke(null, new object[]{obj});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new Exception("No conversion operator found");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16396763Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Serializes a file to a compressed XML file. If an error occurs, the exception is NOT caught.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">The Type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="obj">The object.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="fileName">Name of the file.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void SerializeToXML<T>(T obj, string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (GZipStream compressor = new GZipStream(fs, CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                serializer.Serialize(compressor, obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Deserializes an object from XML.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">The object</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="file">The file.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Di2015NewLine/// The deserialized objectDi2015NewLine/// </returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static T DeserializeFromXml<T>(string file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T result;Di2015NewLine    XmlSerializer ser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(file, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (GZipStream decompressor = new GZipStream(fs, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = (T)ser.Deserialize(decompressor);Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16399611Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Tuple<String, IEnumerable<string>>> GuessGroups(IEnumerable<string> source, int minNameLength=0, int minGroupSize=1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: error checkingDi2015NewLine    return InnerGuessGroups(new Stack<string>(source.OrderByDescending(x => x)), minNameLength, minGroupSize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<Tuple<String, IEnumerable<string>>> InnerGuessGroups(Stack<string> source, int minNameLength, int minGroupSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(source.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tuple = ExtractTuple(GetBestGroup(source, minNameLength), source);Di2015NewLine        if (tuple.Item2.Count() >= minGroupSize)Di2015NewLine            yield return tuple;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var element in GuessGroups(source, minNameLength, minGroupSize))Di2015NewLine            yield return element;   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTuple<String, IEnumerable<string>> ExtractTuple(string prefix, Stack<string> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create(prefix, PopWithPrefix(prefix, source).ToList().AsEnumerable());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<string> PopWithPrefix(string prefix, Stack<string> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (source.Any() && source.Peek().StartsWith(prefix))Di2015NewLine        yield return source.Pop();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring GetBestGroup(IEnumerable<string> source, int minNameLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var s = new Stack<string>(source);Di2015NewLine    var counter = new DictionaryWithDefault<string, int>(0);Di2015NewLine    while(s.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var g = GetCommonPrefix(s);Di2015NewLine        if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(g) && g.Length >= minNameLength)Di2015NewLine            counter[g]++;Di2015NewLine        s.Pop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return counter.OrderBy(c => c.Value).Last().Key;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring GetCommonPrefix(IEnumerable<string> coll)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (from len in Enumerable.Range(0, coll.Min(s => s.Length)).Reverse()Di2015NewLine            let possibleMatch = coll.First().Substring(0, len)Di2015NewLine            where coll.All(f => f.StartsWith(possibleMatch))Di2015NewLine            select possibleMatch).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DictionaryWithDefault<TKey, TValue> : Dictionary<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  TValue _default;Di2015NewLine  public TValue DefaultValue {Di2015NewLine    get { return _default; }Di2015NewLine    set { _default = value; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public DictionaryWithDefault() : base() { }Di2015NewLine  public DictionaryWithDefault(TValue defaultValue) : base() {Di2015NewLine    _default = defaultValue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public new TValue this[TKey key]Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    get { return base.ContainsKey(key) ? base[key] : _default; }Di2015NewLine    set { base[key] = value; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16403540Di2015UniqueSeparatorSemaphore ThreadsAvailable = new Semaphore(10, 10);Di2015NewLinewhile (Queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ThreadsAvailable.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    // Must dequeue item here, otherwise you could run off the end of the queueDi2015NewLine    ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(DoStuff, Queue.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Wait for remaining threads to finishDi2015NewLineint threadCount = 10;Di2015NewLinewhile (threadCount != 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ThreadsAvailable.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    --threadCount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid DoStuff(object item)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ItemType theItem = (ItemType)item;Di2015NewLine    // process the itemDi2015NewLine    StartProcessing(item);Di2015NewLine    // And then release the semaphore so another thread can runDi2015NewLine    ThreadsAvailable.Release();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16403540Di2015UniqueSeparatorlock (queue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        item = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        // There wasn't an item to dequeueDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16403540Di2015UniqueSeparatormain loop checks Queue.Count, which returns 1Di2015NewLinemain loop calls QueueUserWorkItemDi2015NewLinemain loop checks Queue.Count again, which returns 1 because the thread hasn't started yetDi2015NewLinenew thread starts and dequeues an itemDi2015NewLinemain loop tries to dequeue an item and throws an exception because queue.Count == 0Di2015NewLine

16404981Di2015UniqueSeparatorInvert
16404981Di2015UniqueSeparatorInvert
16404981Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Dictionary<TItem, IEnumerable<TKey>> Invert<TKey, TItem>(Dictionary<TKey, IEnumerable<TItem>> dictionary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get collection of all the values which will be keys in the new inverted dictionaryDi2015NewLine    var invertedDictKeys = dictionary.SelectMany(keyValPair => keyValPair.Value).Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Perform the invertDi2015NewLine    var invertedDict = Di2015NewLine        invertedDictKeys.Select(Di2015NewLine            invertedKey => Di2015NewLine            new KeyValuePair<TItem, IEnumerable<TKey>>(invertedKey, dictionary.Keys.Where(key => dict[key].Contains(invertedKey))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convert to dictionary and returnDi2015NewLine    return invertedDict.ToDictionary(keyValPair => keyValPair.Key, keyValPair => keyValPair.Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16406741Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Sub sendAndBlock(ByVal msgs As List(Of ISendable))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Dim taskCount As Integer = msgs.CountDi2015NewLine   Dim fini As New AutoResetEvent(False)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   'vb.net for vs2008 is limited to single-line lambdas.Di2015NewLine   ' But we still need to create a closure to capture the fini and taskCount variablesDi2015NewLine   ' Means we can't translate old code line-for-lineDi2015NewLine   ' Solution is to abstract the old lambda expressions out to their own methds that we can call in a single lineDi2015NewLine   msgs.ForEach(Function(m) QueueMessage(m, fini, taskCount))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   fini.WaitOne()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub QueueMessage(ByVal msg As ISendable, ByVal signaler As AutoRestEvent, ByRef taskCount As Integer)Di2015NewLine    ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(Function(n) SendQueuedMessage(msg, taskCount, signaler), msg);Di2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub SendQueuedMessage(ByVal msg As ISendable, ByRef TaskCount As Integer, ByVal signaler As AutoResetEvent)Di2015NewLine    Me.send(msg)Di2015NewLine    'Not sure about this line, because `Set` is a reserved word in VBDi2015NewLine    If Interlocked.Decrement(taskCount) = 0 Then signaler.Set()Di2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

16410561Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void CreateObjects()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyObject o = new MyObject();Di2015NewLine        o.OnFinished += OnMyObjectFinished;Di2015NewLine        m_myObjectCollection.TryAdd(i.ToString(), o);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16410561Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnMyObjectFinished(object source, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MyObject o = (MyObject)source;Di2015NewLine    RemoveObject(o);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16410660Di2015UniqueSeparatorTimeZoneInfo
16410660Di2015UniqueSeparatorDisplayName

16410660Di2015UniqueSeparator// Look up the time zone.  This won't work on non-English language computers!Di2015NewLine// (setting an English CultureInfo won't help you here)Di2015NewLinevar shippedTZ = TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones()Di2015NewLine    .FirstOrDefault(x => x.DisplayName == shippedTimeZone.Replace("GMT", "UTC"));Di2015NewLineif (shippedTZ == null)Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Time Zone Not Found!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// You may want to handle the exception by hardcoding some specific time zonesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Let's turn your date/time strings into an actual DateTimeDi2015NewLinevar shippedDT = DateTime.ParseExact(shippedDate + " " + shippedTime,Di2015NewLine                            "MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm tt", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Then we'll use the time zone to get a DateTimeOffset.Di2015NewLinevar shippedDTO = new DateTimeOffset(shippedDT,Di2015NewLine                                    shippedTZ.GetUtcOffset(shippedDT));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// And the same thing for the received date...Di2015NewLinevar receivedTZ = TimeZoneInfo.Local;Di2015NewLinevar receivedDT = DateTime.ParseExact(receievedDate + " " + receivedTime,Di2015NewLine                            "MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm tt", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLinevar receivedDTO = new DateTimeOffset(receivedDT,Di2015NewLine                                     receivedTZ.GetUtcOffset(receivedDT));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now you can subtract themDi2015NewLineTimeSpan elapsed = receivedDTO - shippedDTO;Di2015NewLine
16410660Di2015UniqueSeparator// Try to locate the time zoneDi2015NewLinevar bclZoneProvider = DateTimeZoneProviders.Bcl;Di2015NewLinevar zoneShipped = bclZoneProvider.IdsDi2015NewLine    .Select(x => bclZoneProvider[x])Di2015NewLine    .Cast<BclDateTimeZone>()Di2015NewLine    .FirstOrDefault(x => x.DisplayName == shippedTimeZone.Replace("GMT", "UTC"));Di2015NewLineif (zoneShipped == null)Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Time Zone Not Found!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// You wanted the system time zoneDi2015NewLinevar zoneReceived = bclZoneProvider.GetSystemDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Parse the date/time values as a LocalDateTimeDi2015NewLinevar pattern = LocalDateTimePatternDi2015NewLine                  .CreateWithInvariantCulture("MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm tt");Di2015NewLinevar ldtShipped = pattern.Parse(shippedDate + " " + shippedTime).Value;Di2015NewLinevar ldtReceived = pattern.Parse(receievedDate + " " + receivedTime).Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Assign them to the zones.Di2015NewLine// "Leniently" means to use the standard offset when there is an ambiguity.Di2015NewLinevar zdtShipped = ldtShipped.InZoneLeniently(zoneShipped);Di2015NewLinevar zdtReceived = ldtReceived.InZoneLeniently(zoneReceived);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Subtract them to get the Duration you are looking for.Di2015NewLineDuration elapsed = zdtReceived.ToInstant() - zdtShipped.ToInstant();Di2015NewLine
16410713Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<WorkOrderHeader> headersWithoutDetails = Di2015NewLineorder.OrderDetailsDi2015NewLine.SelectMany(od => od.WorkOrderHeaders)Di2015NewLine.Where(woh => !woh.WorkOrderDetails.Any())Di2015NewLine

16415832Di2015UniqueSeparatorreadonly
16415919Di2015UniqueSeparator    int[] ArrTotal(int[] a, int[] b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a == null || b == null) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (int[])(a ?? b).Clone();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int length = Math.Max(a.Length, b.Length);Di2015NewLine        int[] result = new int[length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int sum = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (a.Length > i) sum += a[i];Di2015NewLine            if (b.Length > i) sum += b[i];Di2015NewLine            result[i] = sum;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16416502Di2015UniqueSeparator    private IRestRequest CreateRequest(Uri uri, Method method, object body)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IRestRequest request = new RestRequest(uri, method);Di2015NewLine        request.Resource = uri.ToString();Di2015NewLine        request.Timeout = _timeout;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (body != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            request.AddHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");Di2015NewLine            request.RequestFormat = DataFormat.Json;Di2015NewLine            request.JsonSerializer = new CustomConverter {ContentType = "application/json"};Di2015NewLine            request.AddBody(body);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return request;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16419903Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool TryRead(Stream s, byte[] buffer, int bytes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int read = s.Read(buffer, 0, bytes), offset;Di2015NewLine    if (read <= 0) return false; // no more dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bytes -= read;Di2015NewLine    offset = read;Di2015NewLine    while (bytes > 0 && (read = s.Read(buffer, offset, bytes)) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bytes -= read;Di2015NewLine        offset += read;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (bytes != 0) throw new EndOfStreamException();Di2015NewLine    return true; // successDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16421490Di2015UniqueSeparator//For each 'owlItem' in the owlList, select an anonymous objects for each key in the BandIdentifier string, keeping track of the associated SpeciesCountDi2015NewLine//Since each call to Split('_').Select(...) produces an IEnumerable of those anonymous objects, use SelectMany to flatten the IEnumerable to IEnumerables Di2015NewLineowlList.SelectMany(owlItem => owlItem.BandIdentifier.Split('_')Di2015NewLine                .Select(key => new { OwlKey = key, owlItem.SpeciesCount }))Di2015NewLine            //Group together those anonymous objects if they share the same keyDi2015NewLine            .GroupBy(info => info.OwlKey)Di2015NewLine            //For each of the groups, sum together all the associated SpeciesCountsDi2015NewLine            .Select(group => new { group.Key, SpeciesCount = group.Sum(info => info.SpeciesCount) })'Di2015NewLine

16431123Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string Api(string text, string quality, string email, string pass)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(text) && !String.IsNullOrEmpty(quality) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(email) && !String.IsNullOrEmpty(pass))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request =Di2015NewLine                (HttpWebRequest) WebRequest.Create(new Uri("http://wordai.com/users/regular-api.php"));Di2015NewLine            request.ServicePoint.Expect100Continue = false;Di2015NewLine            request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string postdata = String.Format("s={0}&quality={1}&email={2}&pass={3}&output=json", text, quality, email,Di2015NewLine                                            pass);Di2015NewLine            byte[] postBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(postdata);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine            request.ContentLength = postBytes.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            request.GetRequestStream().Write(postBytes, 0, postBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse) request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            StreamReader stream = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine            string bodystr = stream.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return String.Format("{0}\\r\\n\\r\\n{1}", response.Headers.ToString(), bodystr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "Error: Not All Variables Set!"; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16433207Di2015UniqueSeparator[ServiceBehavior(InstanceContextMode=InstanceContextMode.PerCall)]Di2015NewLinepublic class SimpleService : ISimpleServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string ProcessData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get a handle to the call back channelDi2015NewLine        var callback = OperationContext.Current.GetCallbackChannel<IMyCallbackService>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        callback.NotifyClient();Di2015NewLine        return DateTime.Now.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16439890Di2015UniqueSeparator' This is how the first line appears in the string array after the space splitting'Di2015NewLineDim parts = new string() {"BL", "TH", ":", "NO",  "REF.", ":", "1234567890", "R.WAHYUDIYOINO,IR"}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' This array contains the spaces reserved for each word in the string array above'Di2015NewLineDim spaces = new integer () {3,9,2,17,10,2,17,2,28 }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine' Now loop on the strings and format them as indicated by the spaces'Di2015NewLine' Attention, the value for space include the string itself'Di2015NewLineDim sb = new StringBuilder()Di2015NewLineDim x As INteger = 0Di2015NewLineFor each s in partsDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(s.PadRight(spaces(x)))Di2015NewLine    x += 1Di2015NewLineNextDi2015NewLinesb.AppendLine()Di2015NewLine' To check the result (it is useful only if the output window has fixed space font)'Di2015NewLinesb.Append("12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890")Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(sb.ToString())Di2015NewLine
16440014Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool ReadData(byte[] responseBytes, int bytesExpected, int timeOut)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MySerialPort.ReadTimeout = timeOut;Di2015NewLine    int offset = 0, bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    while(bytesExpected > 0 &&Di2015NewLine      (bytesRead = MySerialPort.Read(responseBytes, offset, bytesExpected)) > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        offset += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine        bytesExpected -= bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bytesExpected == 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16450572Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string TrimLength(string text, int maxLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (text.Length > maxLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        maxLength -= "...".Length;Di2015NewLine        maxLength = text.Length < maxLength ? text.Length : maxLength;Di2015NewLine        bool isLastSpace = text[maxLength] == ' ';Di2015NewLine        string part = text.Substring(0, maxLength);Di2015NewLine        if (isLastSpace)Di2015NewLine            return part + "...";Di2015NewLine        int lastSpaceIndexBeforeMax = part.LastIndexOf(' ');Di2015NewLine        if (lastSpaceIndexBeforeMax == -1)Di2015NewLine            return part + "...";Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return text.Substring(0, lastSpaceIndexBeforeMax) + "...";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return text;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16453943Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic unsafe static int UnsafeCompareTo(byte[] self, byte[] other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (self.Length < other.Length) { return -1; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (self.Length > other.Length) { return +1; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int n = self.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fixed (byte* selfPtr = self, otherPtr = other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte* ptr1 = selfPtr;Di2015NewLine        byte* ptr2 = otherPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte b1;Di2015NewLine        byte b2;Di2015NewLine        while (n-- > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            b1 = (*ptr1++);Di2015NewLine            b2 = (*ptr2++);Di2015NewLine            if (b1 == b2)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            return b1.CompareTo(b2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16458487Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IWhatever { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Foo { }Di2015NewLinepublic class Foo2 : Foo, IWhatever { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Bar { }Di2015NewLinepublic class Bar2 : Bar { }Di2015NewLinepublic class Bar3 : Bar, IWhatever { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IModelProvider<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    U Create<U>() where U : T;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FooProvider : IModelProvider<Foo>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public U Create<U>() where U : FooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create a proper "U" - for example Foo or Foo2Di2015NewLine        return Activator.CreateInstance<U>(); // simpliestDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BarProvider : IModelProvider<Bar>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public U Create<U>() where U : BarDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create a proper "U" - for example Bar, Bar2 or Bar3Di2015NewLine        // more verboseDi2015NewLine        if (typeof(U) == typeof(Bar)) return (U)new Bar();Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(U) == typeof(Bar2)) return (U)(object)new Bar2();Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(U) == typeof(Bar3)) return (U)(object)new Bar3();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WhateverProvider : IModelProvider<IWhatever>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public U Create<U>() where U : IWhatever, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create a proper "U" - for example Foo2 or Bar3Di2015NewLine        return new U(); // really the simpliestDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16458487Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProviderFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IModelProvider<T> Get<T>() where T : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // somehow choose a provider for T, dumb implementation just for example purposesDi2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(Foo)) return (IModelProvider<T>)new FooProvider();Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(Bar)) return (IModelProvider<T>)new BarProvider();Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(IWhatever)) return (IModelProvider<T>)new WhateverProvider();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return VeryGenericProvider<T>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ProviderTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Foo foo = ProviderFactory.Get<Foo>().Create<Foo>();Di2015NewLine        Foo2 foo2 = ProviderFactory.Get<Foo>().Create<Foo2>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Bar2 bar2 = ProviderFactory.Get<Foo>().Create<Bar2>(); - compile errorDi2015NewLine        Bar2 bar2 = ProviderFactory.Get<Bar>().Create<Bar2>(); // - ok!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Bar3 bar3 = ProviderFactory.Get<IWhatever>().Create<Bar3>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16458487Di2015UniqueSeparatorreturn (U)new Bar(); // is ok because U is constrained to 'Bar'Di2015NewLine

16459213Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var arrays = new int[][] {Di2015NewLine            new[]{ 1, 12, 10, 2, 23 },Di2015NewLine            new[] {14,10,20,4},Di2015NewLine            new[] {5, 5, 15, 5},Di2015NewLine            new[] {1, 5, 30}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var array in arrays)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Results for {0}:", string.Join(",", array)));Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> partitions = Partition(array);Di2015NewLine            if (!partitions.Any()) Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Cannot be partitioned.");Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                foreach (var item in partitions)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(string.Join(",", item));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> Partition(int[] array)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sum = array.Sum();Di2015NewLine        if ((sum % 2) == 1) return Enumerable.Empty<IEnumerable<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Subsequences(array).Where(ss => ss.Sum(item => item) == (sum / 2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // http://stackoverflow.com/a/3750709/201088Di2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Subsequences<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var comb in Subsequences(source.Skip(1)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return comb;Di2015NewLine                yield return source.Take(1).Concat(comb);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16459876Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int[] ShiftArray(int[] arr, int shift)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    shift = arr.Length - (shift % arr.Length);Di2015NewLine    Array.Reverse(arr, 0, shift);Di2015NewLine    Array.Reverse(arr, shift, arr.Length-shift);Di2015NewLine    Array.Reverse(arr);Di2015NewLine    return arr;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16461095Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExpressionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> AddContains<T>(this LambdaExpression selector, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mi = typeof (string).GetMethods().First(m => m.Name == "Contains" && m.GetParameters().Length == 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var body = selector.GetBody().AsString();Di2015NewLine        var x = Expression.Call(body, mi, Expression.Constant(value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        LambdaExpression e = Expression.Lambda(x, selector.Parameters.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        return (Expression<Func<T, bool>>)e;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression GetBody(this LambdaExpression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression body;Di2015NewLine        if (expression.Body is UnaryExpression)Di2015NewLine            body = ((UnaryExpression)expression.Body).Operand;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            body = expression.Body;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return body;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression AsString(this Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (expression.Type == typeof (string))Di2015NewLine            return expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo toString = typeof(SqlFunctions).GetMethods().First(m => m.Name == "StringConvert" && m.GetParameters().Length == 1 && m.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType == typeof(double?));Di2015NewLine        var cast = Expression.Convert(expression, typeof(double?));Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Call(toString, cast);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16461101Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Series> GetBccChartData(IEnumerable<MeterReadingsBccChartData> meterReadings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Tuple<DateTime, double>> allData = new List<Tuple<DateTime, double>>();Di2015NewLine    List<Series> series = new List<Series>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in meterReadings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lenght = item.DateAndValue.Count();Di2015NewLine        object[,] data = new object[lenght, 2];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < lenght; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            allData.Add(item.DateAndValue[i]);Di2015NewLine            data[i, 0] = item.DateAndValue[i].Item1;Di2015NewLine            data[i, 1] = item.DateAndValue[i].Item2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Series localSeries = new Series { Name = item.BranchName + " " + item.TypeName + " " + item.Unit, Data = new Data(data), Type = ChartTypes.Column };Di2015NewLine        series.Add(localSeries);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ortalama serisi hesaplanıyor.Di2015NewLine    List<Tuple<DateTime, double>> averageData = allData.GroupBy(x => x.Item1).Select(x => Tuple.Create<DateTime, double>(x.Key, x.Average(item => item.Item2))).ToList();Di2015NewLine    int avgDataLenght = averageData.Count();Di2015NewLine    object[,] dataAvg = new object[avgDataLenght, 2];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < avgDataLenght; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataAvg[i, 0] = averageData[i].Item1;Di2015NewLine        dataAvg[i, 1] = averageData[i].Item2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Series avgSeries = new Series { Name = "Genel Toplam", Data = new Data(dataAvg), Type = ChartTypes.Line };Di2015NewLine    series.Add(avgSeries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return series;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16466437Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetFriendlyName(this Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (type == typeof(int))Di2015NewLine        return "int";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(short))Di2015NewLine        return "short";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(byte))Di2015NewLine        return "byte";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(bool)) Di2015NewLine        return "bool";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(long))Di2015NewLine        return "long";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(float))Di2015NewLine        return "float";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(double))Di2015NewLine        return "double";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(decimal))Di2015NewLine        return "decimal";Di2015NewLine    else if (type == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        return "string";Di2015NewLine    else if (type.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine        return type.Name.Split('`')[0] + "<" + string.Join(", ", type.GetGenericArguments().Select(x => GetFriendlyName(x))) + ">";Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return type.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16466741Di2015UniqueSeparatorinitializer
16466741Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T[][][] NewJagged<T>(Di2015NewLine        int h,Di2015NewLine        int w,Di2015NewLine        ing d,Di2015NewLine        Func<int, int, int, T> initializer = null,Di2015NewLine        bool parallelize = true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (h < 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("h", h, "Dimension less than 1.")Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (w < 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("w", w, "Dimension less than 1.")Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (d < 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("d", d, "Dimension less than 1.")Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (initializer == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        initializer = (i, j, k) => default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (parallelize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return NewJaggedParalellImpl(h, w, d, initializer);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return NewJaggedImpl(h, w, d, initializer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static T[][][] NewJaggedImpl<T>(Di2015NewLine        int h,Di2015NewLine        int w,Di2015NewLine        int d,Di2015NewLine        Func<int, int, int, T> initializer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new T[h][][];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < h; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result[i] = new T[w][];Di2015NewLine        for (var j = 0; j < w; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result[i][j] = new T[d];Di2015NewLine            for (var k = 0; k < d; k++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result[i][j][k] = initializer(i, j, k);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static T[][][] NewJaggedParalellImpl<T>(Di2015NewLine        int h,Di2015NewLine        int w,Di2015NewLine        int d,Di2015NewLine        Func<int, int, int, T> initializer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new T[h][][];Di2015NewLine    ParallelEnumerable.Range(0, h).ForAll(i =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result[i] = new T[w][];Di2015NewLine        ParallelEnumerable.Range(0, w).ForAll(j =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result[i][j] = new T[d];Di2015NewLine            ParallelEnumerable.Range(0, d).ForAll(k =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result[i][j][k] = initializer(i, j, k);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}            Di2015NewLine
16466741Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar foo1 = NewJagged<Foo>(1000, 1000, 500);Di2015NewLine
16466741Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar foo2 = NewJagged<Foo>(Di2015NewLine    1000,Di2015NewLine    1000,Di2015NewLine    5000,Di2015NewLine    (i, j, k) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var pos = (i * 1000 * 500) + (j * 500) + k;Di2015NewLine            return ((pos % 2) == 0) ? new Foo() : null;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine
16466741Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[][][] ThreeDimmer<T>(int h, int w, int d) where T : new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new T[h][][];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < h; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result[i] = new T[w][];Di2015NewLine        for (var j = 0; j < w; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result[i][j] = new T[d];Di2015NewLine            for (var k = 0; k < d; k++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result[i][j][k] = new T();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16475303Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring line;Di2015NewLineSystem.IO.StreamReader file = new System.IO.StreamReader("test.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//get the date at line 12. The date starts from 9th string and has a length of 11.Di2015NewLinestring lineDate = GetLine(@"test.txt", 12);Di2015NewLinestring getDate=lineDate.Substring(9,11);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//get the start time at line 11. The timee starts from 9th string and has a length of 8.Di2015NewLinestring lineTime = GetLine(@"test.txt", 11);Di2015NewLinestring getTime=lineTime.Substring(9,8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//merge date and timeDi2015NewLineDateTime TestTime = DateTime.Parse(getDate + " " + getTime); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile ((line = file.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine      //Reading the line which contains DISKXFER. Eg:"DISKXFER,T0001,0.5,0.0"Di2015NewLine      if (line.Contains("DISKXFER"))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          //split the line and insert to an array, Eg: split[0]=DISKXFERDi2015NewLine            string dataLine = line.ToString();Di2015NewLine            string[] split = dataLine.Split(',');Di2015NewLine            int result = split.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int n = dataGridView1.Rows.Add();Di2015NewLine            //split[] has four elements. Add those elements to four columns in the same row and continue with other linesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //add testtimes to the first columnDi2015NewLine            dataGridView1.Rows[n].Cells[0].Value = TestTime;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < result; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //add split array to other columns in the same row of testtime. Eg: split[0] to column2, split[1] to column3, split[2] to column4, split[3] to column5Di2015NewLine                dataGridView1.Rows[n].Cells[i + 1].Value = split[i];           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TestTime = TestTime.AddMinutes(30);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLinefile.Close(); Di2015NewLine

16478464Di2015UniqueSeparator   /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets a List of all Charts on this SlideDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="slidepart">The {Di2015NewLine        var chartList = new List<PPChart>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (slidepart.ChartParts.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var chart in slidepart.ChartParts)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //// get the ID of the Chart-PartDi2015NewLine                var id = slidepart.GetIdOfPart(chart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //// Get a list of all Shapes(Graphicframes) which contain ChartsDi2015NewLine                var gshapes = from shapeDesc in slidepart.Slide.Descendants<GraphicFrame>() select shapeDesc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var tempgshapes = gshapes.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //// Select all PPChart(result[0].NonVisualGraphicFrameProperties.NonVisualDrawingProperties.Id);Di2015NewLine                ppchart.ShapeName = result[0].NonVisualGraphicFrameProperties.NonVisualDrawingProperties.Name;Di2015NewLine                chartList.Add(ppchart);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return chartList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines whether the Slider has this Chart or not.Di2015NewLine    /// returnValue = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!(gframe == null) && this.HasGraphic(gframe))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!(gframe.Graphic.GraphicData == graphicData.Descendants<DrawCharts.ChartReference>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!(drawChartsRef == null))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var drawChart in drawChartsRef)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (drawChart.Id == id)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            returnValue = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return returnValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines whether the specified GraphicFrame has a graphic (A graphic is a chart!).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="gframe">The gframe.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    ///   <c>true</c> if the specified gframe has a graphic; otherwise, 16478580Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Newtonsoft.Json;Di2015NewLineusing ProtoBuf;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection.Emit;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.Serialization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IBasicRecordDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object this[int field] { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object o = 1;Di2015NewLine        int foo = (int)o;Di2015NewLine        string[] names = { "Id", "Name", "Size", "When" };Di2015NewLine        Type[] types = { typeof(int), typeof(string), typeof(float), typeof(DateTime?) };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var asm = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine            new AssemblyName("DynamicStuff"),Di2015NewLine            AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine        var module = asm.DefineDynamicModule("DynamicStuff");Di2015NewLine        var tb = module.DefineType("MyType", TypeAttributes.Public | TypeAttributes.Serializable);Di2015NewLine        tb.SetCustomAttribute(new CustomAttributeBuilder(Di2015NewLine            typeof(DataContractAttribute).GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes), new object[0]));Di2015NewLine        tb.AddInterfaceImplementation(typeof(IBasicRecord));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FieldBuilder[] fields = new FieldBuilder[names.Length];Di2015NewLine        var dataMemberCtor = typeof(DataMemberAttribute).GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine        var dataMemberProps = new[] { typeof(DataMemberAttribute).GetProperty("Order") };Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < fields.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var field = fields[i] = tb.DefineField("_" + names[i],Di2015NewLine                types[i], FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var prop = tb.DefineProperty(names[i], PropertyAttributes.None,Di2015NewLine                types[i], Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine            var getter = tb.DefineMethod("get_" + names[i],Di2015NewLine                MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.HideBySig, types[i], Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine            prop.SetGetMethod(getter);Di2015NewLine            var il = getter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // thisDi2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, field); // .FooDi2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret); // returnDi2015NewLine            var setter = tb.DefineMethod("set_" + names[i],Di2015NewLine                MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.HideBySig, typeof(void), new Type[] { types[i] });Di2015NewLine            prop.SetSetMethod(setter);Di2015NewLine            il = setter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // thisDi2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1); // valueDi2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, field); // .Foo =Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            prop.SetCustomAttribute(new CustomAttributeBuilder(Di2015NewLine                dataMemberCtor, new object[0],Di2015NewLine                dataMemberProps, new object[1] { i + 1 }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var prop in typeof(IBasicRecord).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var accessor = prop.GetGetMethod();Di2015NewLine            if (accessor != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var args = accessor.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine                var argTypes = Array.ConvertAll(args, a => a.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine                var method = tb.DefineMethod(accessor.Name,Di2015NewLine                    accessor.Attributes & ~MethodAttributes.Abstract,Di2015NewLine                    accessor.CallingConvention, accessor.ReturnType, argTypes);Di2015NewLine                tb.DefineMethodOverride(method, accessor);Di2015NewLine                var il = method.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine                if (args.Length == 1 && argTypes[0] == typeof(int))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var branches = new Label[fields.Length];Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < fields.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        branches[i] = il.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1); // keyDi2015NewLine                    il.Emit(OpCodes.Switch, branches); // switchDi2015NewLine                    // default:Di2015NewLine                    il.ThrowException(typeof(ArgumentOutOfRangeException));Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < fields.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        il.MarkLabel(branches[i]);Di2015NewLine                        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // thisDi2015NewLine                        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, fields[i]); // .FooDi2015NewLine                        if (types[i].IsValueType)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            il.Emit(OpCodes.Box, types[i]); // (object)Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret); // returnDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    il.ThrowException(typeof(NotImplementedException));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            accessor = prop.GetSetMethod();Di2015NewLine            if (accessor != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var args = accessor.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine                var argTypes = Array.ConvertAll(args, a => a.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine                var method = tb.DefineMethod(accessor.Name,Di2015NewLine                    accessor.Attributes & ~MethodAttributes.Abstract,Di2015NewLine                    accessor.CallingConvention, accessor.ReturnType, argTypes);Di2015NewLine                tb.DefineMethodOverride(method, accessor);Di2015NewLine                var il = method.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine                if (args.Length == 2 && argTypes[0] == typeof(int) && argTypes[1] == typeof(object))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var branches = new Label[fields.Length];Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < fields.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        branches[i] = il.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1); // keyDi2015NewLine                    il.Emit(OpCodes.Switch, branches); // switchDi2015NewLine                    // default:Di2015NewLine                    il.ThrowException(typeof(ArgumentOutOfRangeException));Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < fields.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        il.MarkLabel(branches[i]);Di2015NewLine                        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // thisDi2015NewLine                        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_2); // valueDi2015NewLine                        il.Emit(types[i].IsValueType ? OpCodes.Unbox_Any : OpCodes.Castclass, types[i]); // (SomeType)Di2015NewLine                        il.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, fields[i]); // .Foo =Di2015NewLine                        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret); // returnDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    il.ThrowException(typeof(NotImplementedException));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var type = tb.CreateType();Di2015NewLine        var obj = Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine        // we'll use the index (via a known interface) to set the valuesDi2015NewLine        IBasicRecord rec = (IBasicRecord)obj;Di2015NewLine        rec[0] = 123;Di2015NewLine        rec[1] = "abc";Di2015NewLine        rec[2] = 12F;Di2015NewLine        rec[3] = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} = {1}", i, rec[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var ser = new XmlSerializer(type);Di2015NewLine            ser.Serialize(ms, obj);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("XmlSerializer: {0} bytes", ms.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var writer = new StreamWriter(ms, Encoding.UTF8, 1024, true))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ser = new JsonSerializer();Di2015NewLine                ser.Serialize(writer, obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Json.NET: {0} bytes", ms.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var ser = new DataContractSerializer(type);Di2015NewLine            ser.WriteObject(ms, obj);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("DataContractSerializer: {0} bytes", ms.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Serializer.NonGeneric.Serialize(ms, obj);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("protobuf-net: {0} bytes", ms.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // note: NEVER do this unless you have a custom Binder;      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string ProcessorId()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] sn = new byte[8];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!ExecuteCode(ref sn))Di2015NewLine                return "ND";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return string.Format("{0}{1}", BitConverter.ToUInt32(sn, 4).ToString("X8"), BitConverter.ToUInt32(sn, 0).ToString("X8"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool ExecuteCode(ref byte[] result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int num;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* The opcodes below implement a C function with the signature:Di2015NewLine             * __stdcall CpuIdWindowProc(hWnd, Msg, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine             * with wParam interpreted as an 8 byte unsigned character buffer.Di2015NewLine             * */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] code_x86 = new byte[] {Di2015NewLine                0x55,                      /* push ebp */Di2015NewLine                0x89, 0xe5,                /* mov  ebp, esp */Di2015NewLine                0x57,                      /* push edi */Di2015NewLine                0x8b, 0x7d, 0x10,          /* mov  edi, [ebp+0x10] */Di2015NewLine                0x6a, 0x01,                /* push 0x1 */Di2015NewLine                0x58,                      /* pop  eax */Di2015NewLine                0x53,                      /* push ebx */Di2015NewLine                0x0f, 0xa2,                /* cpuid    */Di2015NewLine                0x89, 0x07,                /* mov  [edi], eax */Di2015NewLine                0x89, 0x57, 0x04,          /* mov  [edi+0x4], edx */Di2015NewLine                0x5b,                      /* pop  ebx */Di2015NewLine                0x5f,                      /* pop  edi */Di2015NewLine                0x89, 0xec,                /* mov  esp, ebp */Di2015NewLine                0x5d,                      /* pop  ebp */Di2015NewLine                0xc2, 0x10, 0x00,          /* ret  0x10 */Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            byte[] code_x64 = new byte[] {Di2015NewLine                0x53,                                     /* push rbx */Di2015NewLine                0x48, 0xc7, 0xc0, 0x01, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, /* mov rax, 0x1 */Di2015NewLine                0x0f, 0xa2,                               /* cpuid */Di2015NewLine                0x41, 0x89, 0x00,                         /* mov [r8], eax */Di2015NewLine                0x41, 0x89, 0x50, 0x04,                   /* mov [r8+0x4], edx */Di2015NewLine                0x5b,                                     /* pop rbx */Di2015NewLine                0xc3,                                     /* ret */Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ref byte[] code;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (IsX64Process())Di2015NewLine                code = ref code_x64;Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine                code = ref code_x86;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IntPtr ptr = new IntPtr(code.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!VirtualProtect(code, ptr, PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE, out num))Di2015NewLine                Marshal.ThrowExceptionForHR(Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ptr = new IntPtr(result.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (CallWindowProcW(code, IntPtr.Zero, 0, result, ptr) != IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool IsX64Process() Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return IntPtr.Size == 8;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16491414Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Control> list = new List<Control>();Di2015NewLine        GetAllControl(PNL_custom, list);Di2015NewLine        CenterControlsAsGroup(list, Direction.Both); // center group in the center of the parentDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum DirectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vertical,Di2015NewLine        Horizontal,Di2015NewLine        BothDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CenterControlsAsGroup(List<Control> controls, Direction direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (controls.Count > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int xSum = 0;Di2015NewLine            int ySum = 0;Di2015NewLine            Point center;Di2015NewLine            foreach (Control ctl in controls)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                center = new Point(ctl.Location.X + ctl.Width / 2, ctl.Location.Y + ctl.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine                xSum = xSum + center.X;Di2015NewLine                ySum = ySum + center.Y;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Point average = new Point(xSum / controls.Count, ySum / controls.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            center = new Point(controls[0].Parent.Width / 2, controls[0].Parent.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine            int xOffset = center.X - average.X;Di2015NewLine            int yOffset = center.Y - average.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Control ctl in controls)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (direction)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case Direction.Vertical:Di2015NewLine                        ctl.Location = new Point(ctl.Location.X + xOffset, ctl.Location.Y);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case Direction.Horizontal:Di2015NewLine                        ctl.Location = new Point(ctl.Location.X, ctl.Location.Y + yOffset);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case Direction.Both:Di2015NewLine                        ctl.Location = new Point(ctl.Location.X + xOffset, ctl.Location.Y + yOffset);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetAllControl(Control c, List<Control> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //gets all controls and saves them to a listDi2015NewLine        foreach (Control control in c.Controls)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(control);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16491516Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid DoCopy(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var copytask = new Task(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string destinoComNomeArquivo = @"C:\\" + Path.GetFileName(path);Di2015NewLine        DirectoryCopy(path, destinoComNomeArquivo, false);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    copytask.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DirectoryCopy(string sourceDirName, string destDirName, bool copySubDirs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(sourceDirName);Di2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo[] dirs = dir.GetDirectories();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!dir.Exists)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new DirectoryNotFoundException(Di2015NewLine            "Source directory does not exist or could not be found: "Di2015NewLine            + sourceDirName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!Directory.Exists(destDirName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(destDirName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FileInfo[] files = dir.GetFiles();Di2015NewLine    foreach (FileInfo file in files)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string temppath = Path.Combine(destDirName, file.Name);Di2015NewLine        file.CopyTo(temppath, false);                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var counter = 0;Di2015NewLine    var maxcounter = files.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (maxcounter < counter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var item = files.ElementAt(counter).Name;Di2015NewLine        WriteAsnc(item);Di2015NewLine        counter++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (copySubDirs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (DirectoryInfo subdir in dirs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string temppath = Path.Combine(destDirName, subdir.Name);Di2015NewLine            DirectoryCopy(subdir.FullName, temppath, copySubDirs);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst int _maxwritingprocess = Environment.ProcessorCount;Di2015NewLineint _currentwritingtasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid WriteAsnc(string filepath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _currentwritingtasks++;Di2015NewLine    var task = Task.Factory.StartNew(() => Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XDocument doc = XDocument.Load(filepath);Di2015NewLine        doc.Elements().First().Add(new XAttribute("Attribute Name","Attribute Value"));Di2015NewLine        doc.Save(filepath);Di2015NewLine        _currentwritingtasks--;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    if(_currentwritingtasks == _maxwritingprocess)Di2015NewLine        task.Wait();Di2015NewLine    _currentwritingtasks--;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16492156Di2015UniqueSeparator//Renames the printerDi2015NewLinepublic static void RenamePrinter(string sPrinterName, string newName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ManagementScope oManagementScope = new ManagementScope(ManagementPath.DefaultPath);Di2015NewLine    oManagementScope.Connect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SelectQuery oSelectQuery = new SelectQuery();Di2015NewLine    oSelectQuery.QueryString = @"SELECT * FROM Win32_Printer WHERE Name = '" + sPrinterName.Replace("\\\\", "\\\\\\\\") + "'";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ManagementObjectSearcher oObjectSearcher =Di2015NewLine        new ManagementObjectSearcher(oManagementScope, oSelectQuery);Di2015NewLine    ManagementObjectCollection oObjectCollection = oObjectSearcher.Get();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (oObjectCollection.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (ManagementObject oItem in oObjectCollection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int state = (int)oItem.InvokeMethod("RenamePrinter", new object[] { newName });Di2015NewLine        switch (state)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 0:Di2015NewLine                //Success do noting elseDi2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            case 1:Di2015NewLine                throw new AccessViolationException("Access Denied");Di2015NewLine            case 1801:Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Invalid Printer Name");Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine        var theHeistNames =Di2015NewLine            string.Join(", ",Di2015NewLine                artistDocumentDi2015NewLine                .Element(artistNamespace + "metadata")Di2015NewLine                .Element(artistNamespace + "release-group-list")Di2015NewLine                .Elements(artistNamespace + "release-group")Di2015NewLine                .Where(element => element.Attribute("id").Value == "22315cdd-4ed9-427c-9492-560cf4afed58").Single()Di2015NewLine                .Elements(artistNamespace + "artist-credit")Di2015NewLine                .Elements(artistNamespace + "name-credit")Di2015NewLine                .Elements(artistNamespace + "artist")Di2015NewLine                .Select(artist => artist.Element(artistNamespace + "name").Value).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(theHeistNames);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This query will get it for everything in the XDocument. 16493849Di2015UniqueSeparator        const string test = "aabccc"; // contains barber pole charactersDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(test);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var longest = test.ToCodepoints().RunLengthEncode().OrderByDescending(itemCount => itemCount.Item2).First();Di2015NewLine        var subsequence = String.Concat(Enumerable.Repeat(Char.ConvertFromUtf32(longest.Item1), longest.Item2));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(subsequence);Di2015NewLine
16493849Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Text.Encoding
16493849Di2015UniqueSeparatorint
16493849Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<int> ToCodepoints(this String s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var codeunits = s.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine        var i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (i < codeunits.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int codepoint;Di2015NewLine            if (Char.IsSurrogate(codeunits[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                codepoint = Char.ConvertToUtf32(codeunits[i], codeunits[i + 1]);Di2015NewLine                i += 2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                codepoint = codeunits[i];Di2015NewLine                i += 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            yield return codepoint;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
16493849Di2015UniqueSeparatorItem1
16493849Di2015UniqueSeparatorItem2
16493849Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, int>> RunLengthEncode<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T item = default(T); // value never usedDi2015NewLine        int length = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var nextItem in sequence)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (length == 0) // first itemDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                item = nextItem;Di2015NewLine                length = 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (item.Equals(nextItem)) // continuing runDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                length++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else // run boundaryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var run = Tuple.Create(item, length);Di2015NewLine                item = nextItem;Di2015NewLine                length = 1;Di2015NewLine                yield return run;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (length > 0) // last runDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Tuple.Create(item, length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLine        public T Value { get { return value; } }Di2015NewLine        public Node(T value) { this.value = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Node root;Di2015NewLine    public void Add(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newNode = new Node(value);Di2015NewLine        var node = root;Di2015NewLine        if (node == null) root = newNode;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (node.Next != null) node = node.Next;Di2015NewLine            node.Next = newNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Enumerator GetEnumerator() { return new Enumerator(this); }Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator<T> IEnumerable<T>.GetEnumerator() { return GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLine    public struct Enumerator : IEnumerator, IEnumerator<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        void IDisposable.Dispose() { node = null; list = null; }Di2015NewLine        void IEnumerator.Reset() { node = null; }Di2015NewLine        object IEnumerator.Current { get { return Current; } }Di2015NewLine        private MyList<T> list;Di2015NewLine        private Node node;Di2015NewLine        public bool MoveNext()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node = list.root;Di2015NewLine                return node != null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (node.Next == null) return false;Di2015NewLine                node = node.Next;Di2015NewLine                return node != null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        internal Enumerator(MyList<T> list) { this.list = list; node = null; }Di2015NewLine        public T Current { get { return node == null ? default(T) : node.Value; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16500164Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TermocoppiaDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // be sure to add all of your values here...Di2015NewLine    double[] t = { 1.019, 1.537, 2.059, ... };Di2015NewLine    double[] d = { 10, 20, 30, ... };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double Calcola(double milliV, double _tempEx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (milliV <= t[0])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // handle first caseDi2015NewLine            _tempEx = d[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool success = false;Di2015NewLine            int count = t.Length;Di2015NewLine            // loop through all t values, test, and then calculateDi2015NewLine            for (int idx = 1; idx < count; idx++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (milliV <= t[idx])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _tempEx = d[idx] - Di2015NewLine                        ((t[idx] - milliV) / ((t[idx] - t[idx - 1]) / 10));Di2015NewLine                    success = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (success == false)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Unable to calculate _tempEX");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _tempEx;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16500258Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void start() {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < h; y++) {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < w; x++) {Di2015NewLine                if (array[y][x] == 0) {Di2015NewLine                    int pos[] = {x,y};Di2015NewLine                    path = new ArrayList<int[]>();Di2015NewLine                    path.add(pos);Di2015NewLine                    startx = x;Di2015NewLine                    starty = y;Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, 1, 0);Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, -1, 0);Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, 0, -1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
16500258Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void follow(int x, int y, int dx, int dy) {Di2015NewLine        x += dx;Di2015NewLine        y += dy;Di2015NewLine        while (x >= 0 && x < w && y >= 0 && y < h) {Di2015NewLine            if (x == startx && y == starty) {Di2015NewLine                for (int[] pos : path) {Di2015NewLine                    System.out.printf("[%d,%d] ",pos[1], pos[0]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                System.out.printf("\\n");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (array[y][x] != 0) {Di2015NewLine                int pos[] = {x,y};Di2015NewLine                path.add(pos);Di2015NewLine                if (dx != 0) {Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, 0, -1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, 1, 0);Di2015NewLine                    follow(x, y, -1, 0);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                path.remove(path.size()-1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            x += dx;Di2015NewLine            y += dy;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16517768Di2015UniqueSeparatorSelect:
16517768Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<Data,Data> CreateNewStatement( string fields )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // input parameter "o"Di2015NewLine    var xParameter = Expression.Parameter( typeof( Data ), "o" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // new statement "new Data()"Di2015NewLine    var xNew = Expression.New( typeof( Data ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create initializersDi2015NewLine    var bindings = fields.Split( ',' ).Select( o => o.Trim() )Di2015NewLine        .Select( o => {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // property "Field1"Di2015NewLine            var mi = typeof( Data ).GetProperty( o );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // original value "o.Field1"Di2015NewLine            var xOriginal = Expression.Property( xParameter, mi );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // set value "Field1 = o.Field1"Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Bind( mi, xOriginal );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // initialization "new Data { Field1 = o.Field1, Field2 = o.Field2 }"Di2015NewLine    var xInit = Expression.MemberInit( xNew, bindings );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // expression "o => new Data { Field1 = o.Field1, Field2 = o.Field2 }"Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<Data,Data>>( xInit, xParameter );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // compile to Func<Data, Data>Di2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
