16517861Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        var obj = new { A = "abc", B = 123 };Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine(obj.GetHashCode());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16517861Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int B; // note a field!Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var obj1 = new { A = "abc", B = 123 };Di2015NewLine        var obj2 = new Foo { A = "abc", B = 123 };Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(MemberwiseComparer.AreEquivalent(obj1, obj2)); // TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        obj1 = new { A = "abc", B = 123 };Di2015NewLine        obj2 = new Foo { A = "abc", B = 456 };Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(MemberwiseComparer.AreEquivalent(obj1, obj2)); // FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        obj1 = new { A = "def", B = 123 };Di2015NewLine        obj2 = new Foo { A = "abc", B = 456 };Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(MemberwiseComparer.AreEquivalent(obj1, obj2)); // FalseDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class MemberwiseComparerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool AreEquivalent(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // deal with nulls...Di2015NewLine        if (x == null) return y == null;Di2015NewLine        if (y == null) return false;Di2015NewLine        return AreEquivalentImpl((dynamic)x, (dynamic)y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static bool AreEquivalentImpl<TX, TY>(TX x, TY y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return AreEquivalentCache<TX, TY>.Eval(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static class AreEquivalentCache<TX, TY>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static AreEquivalentCache()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const BindingFlags flags = BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance;Di2015NewLine            var xMembers = typeof(TX).GetProperties(flags).Select(p => p.Name)Di2015NewLine                .Concat(typeof(TX).GetFields(flags).Select(f => f.Name));Di2015NewLine            var yMembers = typeof(TY).GetProperties(flags).Select(p => p.Name)Di2015NewLine                .Concat(typeof(TY).GetFields(flags).Select(f => f.Name));Di2015NewLine            var members = xMembers.Intersect(yMembers);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression body = null;Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression x = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TX), "x"),Di2015NewLine                                y = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TY), "y");Di2015NewLine            foreach (var member in members)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var thisTest = Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.PropertyOrField(x, member),Di2015NewLine                    Expression.PropertyOrField(y, member));Di2015NewLine                body = body == null ? thisTestDi2015NewLine                    : Expression.AndAlso(body, thisTest);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (body == null) body = Expression.Constant(true);Di2015NewLine            func = Expression.Lambda<Func<TX, TY, bool>>(body, x, y).Compile();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private static readonly Func<TX, TY, bool> func;Di2015NewLine        public static bool Eval(TX x, TY y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return func(x, y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16517980Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnNavigating(object sender, NavigatingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //take the uri string, not sure is the right method nameDi2015NewLine        string uri = e.Uri.AbsoluteUri;Di2015NewLine        if (uri.StartsWith("mailto"))Di2015NewLine            e.Cancel = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
16518063Di2015UniqueSeparator    private const int MaxWaitTime = 5000;Di2015NewLine    private SqlListener<RecordType> _recordListener;Di2015NewLine    private RecordType _record;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ManualResetEvent _recordWaiter = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Request a record and wait until it is found.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public RecordType GetRecordAwait(int requestedId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Initiate listening for recordDi2015NewLine        _recordListener = new SqlListener<RecordType>();Di2015NewLine        _recordListener.SqlModified += SqlListener_SqlModified;Di2015NewLine        _recordListener.StartListening(requestedId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wait synchronously until record is foundDi2015NewLine        _recordWaiter.WaitOne(MaxWaitTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Stop listeningDi2015NewLine        _recordListener.SqlModified -= SqlListener_SqlModified;Di2015NewLine        _recordListener.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        _recordListener = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return recordDi2015NewLine        return _record;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SqlListener_SqlModified(object sender, SqlModifiedArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _record = (RecordType)args.Record;Di2015NewLine        _recordWaiter.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16518902Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void ProcessXml(string document)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var doc = XDocument.Parse(document, LoadOptions.None);Di2015NewLine        var uniqueSystemList = doc.Element("SNS").Elements();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var treeView = new TreeView();Di2015NewLine        string value = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        string text = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var uniqueSystem in uniqueSystemList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = uniqueSystem.Element("label").Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            text = uniqueSystem.Element("system").Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            var uniqueSystemNode = new TreeNode(text, value);Di2015NewLine            var uniqueSubsystemList = uniqueSystem.Elements("uniqueSubsystem");Di2015NewLine            foreach (var uniqueSubSystem in uniqueSubsystemList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = uniqueSubSystem.Element("label").Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                text = uniqueSubSystem.Element("subsystem").Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                var uniqueSubSystemNode = new TreeNode(text, value);Di2015NewLine                var uniqueUnitList = uniqueSubSystem.Elements("uniqueUnit");Di2015NewLine                foreach (var uniqueUnit in uniqueUnitList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    value = uniqueUnit.Element("label").Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    text = uniqueUnit.Element("unit").Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    var uniqueUnitNode = new TreeNode(text, value);Di2015NewLine                    uniqueSubSystemNode.ChildNodes.Add(uniqueUnitNode);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                uniqueSystemNode.ChildNodes.Add(uniqueSubSystemNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            treeView.Nodes.Add(uniqueSystemNode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16519603Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var signedDoc = new XmlDocument { PreserveWhitespace = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    signedDoc.Load("test_signed.xml");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (XmlElement root in signedDoc.GetElementsByTagName("PackageRoot"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (XmlElement signature in root.GetElementsByTagName("Signature"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var success = signature.VerifySignature(certificate);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(success ? " successful!" : " failed!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Done.");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Sign(this XmlElement element, X509Certificate2 certificate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var identifier = Guid.NewGuid().ToString("N");Di2015NewLine    element.SetAttribute("Id", identifier);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var signedXml = new SignedXml(element) { SigningKey = certificate.PrivateKey };Di2015NewLine    signedXml.AddReference(new Reference("#" + identifier));Di2015NewLine    signedXml.ComputeSignature();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var xmlDigitalSignature = signedXml.GetXml();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    element.OwnerDocument.DocumentElement.AppendChild(Di2015NewLine        element.OwnerDocument.ImportNode(xmlDigitalSignature, true));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool VerifySignature(this XmlElement element, X509Certificate2 certificate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var signedXml = new SignedXml(element.OwnerDocument);Di2015NewLine    signedXml.LoadXml(element);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return signedXml.CheckSignature(certificate, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16530075Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class DataContractSerializerFactory<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<Type> GetTypeArguments(Type t, IEnumerable<Type> values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (t.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine                foreach (var arg in t.GetGenericArguments())Di2015NewLine                    values = values.Union(GetTypeArguments(arg, values));Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                values = values.Union(new[] { t });Di2015NewLine            return values;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static DataContractSerializer Create()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T), GetTypeArguments(typeof(T), new[] { typeof(T) }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var x = Tuple.Create(Guid.NewGuid(), new[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var serializer = DataContractSerializerFactory<Tuple<Guid, int[]>>.Create();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = XmlWriter.Create(sb))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            serializer.WriteObject(writer, x);Di2015NewLine            writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16530142Di2015UniqueSeparatorWait
16530142Di2015UniqueSeparatorSaySomething
16530142Di2015UniqueSeparatorWait
16530142Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ThreadPracticeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static CountdownEvent CountDown = new CountdownEvent(4);Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Thread(() => SaySomething("I am Thread one.")).Start();Di2015NewLine            new Thread(() => SaySomething("I am thread two.")).Start();Di2015NewLine            new Thread(() => SaySomethingElse("Hello From a different Thread")).Start();Di2015NewLine            new Thread(() => SaySomething("I am Thread Three.")).Start();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Calling Signal (time #{0})", i);Di2015NewLine                CountDown.Signal();Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done"); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void SaySomething(string Something)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CountDown.Wait();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(Something);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void SaySomethingElse(string SomethingElse)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(SomethingElse);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16530142Di2015UniqueSeparatorCalling Signal (time #0)Di2015NewLineHello From a different ThreadDi2015NewLineCalling Signal (time #1)Di2015NewLineCalling Signal (time #2)Di2015NewLineCalling Signal (time #3)Di2015NewLineI am Thread one.Di2015NewLineI am Thread Three.Di2015NewLineI am thread two.Di2015NewLineDoneDi2015NewLine

16536613Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class SearchProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Func<object, bool> GetSearchMethod(SelectorOperator selectorOperator, string conditionFieldValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (selectorOperator)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //stringsDi2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.Contains:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(s => s.ToString().ToLower().Contains(conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.StartsWith:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(s => s.ToString().ToLower().StartsWith(conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.EndsWith:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(s => s.ToString().ToLower().EndsWith(conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.Is:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(s => string.Equals(s.ToString(), conditionFieldValue, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //numbersDi2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.Equals:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(n => (long)n == long.Parse(conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.IsGreaterThan:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(n => (long)n > long.Parse(conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.IsLessThan:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(n => (long)n < long.Parse(conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //typeDi2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.TypeIs:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(t => (EventLogEntryType)t == (EventLogEntryType)Enum.Parse(typeof(EventLogEntryType), conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLine            case SelectorOperator.TypeIsNot:Di2015NewLine                return new Func<object, bool>(t => (EventLogEntryType)t != (EventLogEntryType)Enum.Parse(typeof(EventLogEntryType), conditionFieldValue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Unknown selector operator");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static List<EventLogItem> SearchAll(List<EventLogItem> currentLogs, SearchQuery query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (SearchCondition condition in query.Conditions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var search = GetSearchMethod(condition.SelectorOperator, condition.FieldValue as string);Di2015NewLine            switch (condition.FieldName)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case FieldItem.Category:Di2015NewLine                    currentLogs = currentLogs.Where(item => search(item.Category)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case FieldItem.InstanceID:Di2015NewLine                    currentLogs = currentLogs.Where(item => search(item.InstanceID)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case FieldItem.LogName:Di2015NewLine                    currentLogs = currentLogs.Where(item => search(item.LogName)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case FieldItem.Message:Di2015NewLine                    currentLogs = currentLogs.Where(item => search(item.Message)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case FieldItem.Number:Di2015NewLine                    currentLogs = currentLogs.Where(item => search(item.Number)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case FieldItem.Source:Di2015NewLine                    currentLogs = currentLogs.Where(item => search(item.Source)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case FieldItem.Type:Di2015NewLine                    currentLogs = currentLogs.Where(item => search(item.Type)).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return currentLogs;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16538771Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.Serialization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MetricResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Metric { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string NewValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string DeltaValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // define some metric results to serializeDi2015NewLine        var metricResults = new[] Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            new MetricResult { Metric = "metric 1", NewValue = "new value 1", DeltaValue = "delta 1" },Di2015NewLine            new MetricResult { Metric = "metric 2", NewValue = "new value 2", DeltaValue = "delta 2" },Di2015NewLine            new MetricResult { Metric = "metric 3", NewValue = "new value 3", DeltaValue = "delta 3" },Di2015NewLine        }.ToList();Di2015NewLine        var serializer = new XmlSerializer(metricResults.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var writer = XmlWriter.Create("metrics.xml"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // serialize the metric results we defined previously to metrics.xmlDi2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(writer, metricResults);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var reader = XmlReader.Create("metrics.xml"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // read metrics.xml and deserialize backDi2015NewLine            metricResults = (List<MetricResult>)serializer.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var result in metricResults)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("metric: {0}, new value: {1}, delta: {2}", result.Metric, result.NewValue, result.DeltaValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16538803Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static double AngleDifference(double a, double b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (a < b - Math.PI) a += Math.PI * 2;Di2015NewLine    while (b < a - Math.PI) b += Math.PI * 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Math.Abs(a - b);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16541350Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DownloaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IDictionary<string, string> _map;Di2015NewLine    private IDictionary<string, string> _storage = new ConcurrentDictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    private ConcurrentDictionary<string, Task<string>> _progress = new ConcurrentDictionary<string,Task<string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Downloader(IDictionary<string, string> map)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _map = map ?? new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public async Task<string> Get(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string path;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!_map.TryGetValue(key, out path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("The specified key wasn't found");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_storage.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _storage[key];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task<string> task;Di2015NewLine        if (_progress.TryGetValue(key, out task))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return await task;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        task = _retrieveFile(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!_progress.TryAdd(key, task))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return await Get(key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _storage[key] = await task;Di2015NewLine        return _storage[key];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private async Task<string> _retrieveFile(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Started retrieving {0}", path);Di2015NewLine        await Task.Delay(3000);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Finished retrieving {0}", path);Di2015NewLine        return path + " local path";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16542197Di2015UniqueSeparator private static byte[] EncryptString(byte[] clearText, byte[] Key, byte[] IV)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        Rijndael alg = Rijndael.Create();Di2015NewLine        alg.Key = Key; //Look at the linked Stackoverflow-ThreadDi2015NewLine        alg.IV = IV; // on how to create Key and IVDi2015NewLine        CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, alg.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine        cs.Write(clearText, 0, clearText.Length);Di2015NewLine        cs.Close();Di2015NewLine        byte[] encryptedData = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        return encryptedData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16546513Di2015UniqueSeparator    //contains a list of default items for the combobox itemsDi2015NewLine    List<string> comboList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        initComboList(); //initialize the defaultsDi2015NewLine        initCombobox(); //initialize the combobox list itemsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //fills the defaults for the combobox itemsDi2015NewLine    private void initComboList()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        comboList.Add("red");Di2015NewLine        comboList.Add("blue");Di2015NewLine        comboList.Add("green");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //initializes the combobox itemsDi2015NewLine    private void initCombobox()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        comboBox1.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string s in comboList)Di2015NewLine            comboBox1.Items.Add(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //occurs when the text changes in the comboboxDi2015NewLine    private void comboBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string curtext = comboBox1.Text;Di2015NewLine        insertIntoComboBox(curtext);   //insert the current text into comboboxDi2015NewLine        comboBox1.Select(curtext.Length, 0); //if you don't do this, the cursor goes back to index 0 :-(Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //called whenever is desired to insert the current text into the combobox itemsDi2015NewLine    private void insertIntoComboBox(string curtext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        comboBox1.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine        //only add the current text if it's not already in the list of defaults and not empty stringDi2015NewLine        if (comboList.Contains(curtext) == false && curtext.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            comboBox1.Items.Add(curtext);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string s in comboList)Di2015NewLine                comboBox1.Items.Add(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //called whenever combobox loses focusDi2015NewLine    private void comboBox1_Leave(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        initCombobox();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16549617Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallel.ForEach
16549617Di2015UniqueSeparator// The await keyword is really useful when you want to run something in a loop. For instance:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring[] uris =Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    "http://linqpad.net",Di2015NewLine    "http://linqpad.net/downloadglyph.png",Di2015NewLine    "http://linqpad.net/linqpadscreen.png",Di2015NewLine    "http://linqpad.net/linqpadmed.png",Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Try doing the following without the await keyword!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint totalLength = 0;Di2015NewLineforeach (string uri in uris)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string html = await (new WebClient().DownloadStringTaskAsync (new Uri (uri)));Di2015NewLine    totalLength += html.Length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinetotalLength.Dump();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The continuation is not just 'totalLength += html.Length', but the rest of the loop! (And that finalDi2015NewLine// call to 'totalLength.Dump()' at the end.)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Logically, execution EXITS THE METHOD and RETURNS TO THE CALLER upon reaching the await statement. RatherDi2015NewLine// like a 'yield return' (in fact, the compiler uses the same state-machine engine to rewrite asynchronousDi2015NewLine// functions as it does iterators).Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// When the task completes, the continuation kicks off and execution jumps back into the middle of the Di2015NewLine// loop - right where it left off!Di2015NewLine

16549822Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<TKey, TValue> ToDictionary<TKey, TValue>(this NameValueCollection col)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dict = new Dictionary<TKey, TValue>();Di2015NewLine    var keyConverter = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(typeof(TKey));Di2015NewLine    var valueConverter = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(typeof(TValue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(string name in col)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TKey key = (TKey)keyConverter.ConvertFromString(name);Di2015NewLine        TValue value = (TValue)valueConverter.ConvertFromString(col[name]);Di2015NewLine        dict.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dict;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16550114Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        keyboard = Keyboard.GetState();Di2015NewLine        mouse = Mouse.GetState();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (CheckKeyboard(Keys.Up))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (selected > 0) selected--;Di2015NewLine            else{selected = buttonList.Count - 1;}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (CheckKeyboard(Keys.Down))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (selected < buttonList.Count - 1) selected++;Di2015NewLine            else {selected = 0;}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        prevMouse = mouse;Di2015NewLine        prevKeyboard = keyboard;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CheckMouse()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (mouse.LeftButton == ButtonState.Pressed && prevMouse.LeftButton == ButtonState.Released);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CheckKeyboard(Keys key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Here is the only thing that needed to be changed, based on your original postDi2015NewLine        //you were checking if both keys were down originally, meaning it was always Di2015NewLine        // true while a button was pressed. if the previous keyboard was down,Di2015NewLine        //and the current keyboard is up, it means the button was released.Di2015NewLine        return (keyboard.IsKeyUp(key) && prevKeyboard.IsKeyDown(key));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16556874Di2015UniqueSeparator        public Bitmap SetImageOpacity(Image image, float opacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //create a Bitmap the size of the image provided  Di2015NewLine                Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(image.Width, image.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //create a graphics object from the image  Di2015NewLine                using (Graphics gfx = Graphics.FromImage(bmp))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //create a color matrix object  Di2015NewLine                    ColorMatrix matrix = new ColorMatrix();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //set the opacity  Di2015NewLine                    matrix.Matrix33 = opacity;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //create image attributes  Di2015NewLine                    ImageAttributes attributes = new ImageAttributes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //set the color(opacity) of the image  Di2015NewLine                    attributes.SetColorMatrix(matrix, ColorMatrixFlag.Default, ColorAdjustType.Bitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //now draw the image  Di2015NewLine                    gfx.DrawImage(image, new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), 0, 0, image.Width, image.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attributes);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return bmp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Bitmap first = new Bitmap(pictureBox1.Image); 16558355Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource FirstOrDefault<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source) {Di2015NewLine    if (source == null) throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null) {Di2015NewLine        if (list.Count > 0) return list[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> e = source.GetEnumerator()) {Di2015NewLine            if (e.MoveNext()) return e.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return default(TSource);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static TSource FirstOrDefault<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource>source, Func<TSource, bool> predicate) {Di2015NewLine    if (source == null) throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null) throw Error.ArgumentNull("predicate");Di2015NewLine    foreach (TSource element in source) {Di2015NewLine        if (predicate(element)) return element;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return default(TSource);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16562268Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression<Func<T, dynamic>>
16562268Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static PropertyInfo GetProperty<T>(this Expression<Func<T, dynamic>> expression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MemberExpression memberExpression = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (expression.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                memberExpression = ((UnaryExpression)expression.Body).Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (expression.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                memberExpression = expression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (memberExpression == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Not a member access", "expression");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return memberExpression.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

16565139Di2015UniqueSeparator// When set to True, Enter Key will update SourceDi2015NewLine#region EnterUpdatesTextSource DependencyPropertyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Property to determine if the Enter key should update the source. Default is FalseDi2015NewLinepublic static readonly DependencyProperty EnterUpdatesTextSourceProperty =Di2015NewLine    DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("EnterUpdatesTextSource", typeof (bool),Di2015NewLine                                        typeof (TextBoxHelper),Di2015NewLine                                        new PropertyMetadata(false, EnterUpdatesTextSourcePropertyChanged));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// GetDi2015NewLinepublic static bool GetEnterUpdatesTextSource(DependencyObject obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (bool) obj.GetValue(EnterUpdatesTextSourceProperty);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// SetDi2015NewLinepublic static void SetEnterUpdatesTextSource(DependencyObject obj, bool value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    obj.SetValue(EnterUpdatesTextSourceProperty, value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Changed Event - 16565306Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (Session["CurrCatId"] != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CurrCatId = (int)(Session["CurrCatId"]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if the dictionary isn't even in Session yet then add itDi2015NewLine    if (Session["itemColl"] == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Session["itemColl"] = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now we can safely pull it out every timeDi2015NewLine    itemColl = (Dictionary<int, int>)Session["itemColl"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if the CurrCatId doesn't have a key yet, let's add itDi2015NewLine    // but with an initial value of zeroDi2015NewLine    if (!itemColl.ContainsKey(CurrCatId))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        itemColl.Add(CurrCatId, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now we can safely increment itDi2015NewLine    itemColl[CurrCatId]++;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
